title: Squid Game Token
description: A short lesson to help you apply Squid Game Token.

hook.text: The SQUID token surged 75,000% in days, riding hype from the Netflix show. Then it went to zero in five minutes.

buildup.text: The token's code prevented holders from selling. Only the creators could cash out â€” a feature buried in the contract.

discovery.text: After the price exploded, the creators sold everything at once. The price crashed from $2,861 to $0.0008.

twist.text: CNBC and other major outlets had covered the token's rise. Mainstream media amplified the scam without investigating.

climax.text: The creators walked away with an estimated $3.4 million. Nobody was identified or arrested.

punchline.text: Up 75,000%. Down to zero. Five minutes.

quiz.question: What prevented SQUID token holders from selling?
options: The smart contract code blocked all sales except by the creators
